Git_getDiff.name: Git_getDiff
Git_getDiff.description:
Returns the diff from the merge-base (common ancestor) of HEAD and a reference, up to HEAD.
This effectively shows changes introduced on the current branch relative to that base.

parameters.name: baseRef
parameters.description:
Optional commit SHA or branch name.
	 *                - If provided: Uses `git merge-base <baseRef> HEAD` to find the diff start point.
	 *                - If omitted: Attempts to guess the source branch (e.g., main, develop)
	 *                  by inspecting other local branches and uses that for the merge-base calculation.
	 *                  Note: Guessing the source branch may be unreliable in some cases.

Git_getDiff.returns: The git diff. Note this could be a large string.

Git_getStagedDiff.name: Git_getStagedDiff
Git_getStagedDiff.description: Gets the diff of all currently staged files against the HEAD commit.
Git_getStagedDiff.returns: The git diff for staged changes. This could be a large string.

Git_getStagedFiles.name: Git_getStagedFiles
Git_getStagedFiles.description: Gets the list of file paths for all currently staged files.
Git_getStagedFiles.returns: An array of file paths that are staged for the next commit.

Git_commit.name: Git_commit
Git_commit.description: Commits the staged changes to the repository

Git_getRecentCommits.name: Git_getRecentCommits
Git_getRecentCommits.description: Gets the details of the most recent commits
Git_getRecentCommits.returns: An array of the commit details
